nodes.text: The RK-6 Starforged blaster was a model of blaster pistol available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. It was a similar model to the RK-4 Starforged blaster, but featured a large magazine on its stock.
The RK-6 Starforged blaster was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Apprentice's Shadow Pack.
